divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the academy, in front of the window loocking the sky, loocking for this kid of object, I was thinking in this object like the Mexican objects, when I saw this one, I call a yang woman that was near me for too see and confirm what I was saw. Then call the others people for to see too. That wasn't my first experiency. I had others but that was the last.
Summary: Metalic sphere, no nose, through the sky, stright line, moving slowly
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Belo Horizonte
There were no other sightings in Belo Horizonte on or around July 15th 2007
